channel.description: This is an example feed showing the very basics of what constitutes a web feed
channel.title: ColdBox Beginner Feed

item.title: Our first ColdBox feed item!
item.description: Congratulations you have successfully created your first ColdBox feed.
item.author: bengarrett@example.com (Ben Garrett)

item.title: Optional tags
item.description: In this item we have choosen to leave out the author tag.

item.title: Broken links
item.description: Don't click those example links. They are fake, but are design to to give you an example when implementing your own feeds.
